content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting the netherlands from the united states with a friend. to celebrate the new year while we were there, we headed to dam square with some friends.

minutes before the clock struck midnight, i very easily saw a red/orange ufo that presented itself as a glowing orb of light. it's projection was steady and clear (as captured on film) for over 30 seconds as i traced it pass over us.

the video is shot from a 10 mega pixel digital camera at high resolution with optimized exposure settings for the dark environment. i am a film student attending a private university and prefer to do my own white balancing, so to speak.

i had my camera fine-tuned constantly to capture every detail of my trip in the netherlands, and my skill as a photographer paid off when i turned my lens past the fireworks on one of the most memorable nights of my life.

eyes open,
[witness name deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: A ufo i filmed, very well, from dam's square in amsterdam on new year's 12/31/09.

content.detailedDescription: I saw two triangles joined at one side and separated by about 30 degrees that were lighted and appeared just above the horizon near the moon. the fog was thin though the moon was misty looking. i could discern the entire shape of the moon. the circle of the moon was sharp but the body of the moon looked similar to how it would look through foggy glasses. the two triangles were to the left of the moon but much closer and not obscured at all by the fog. they were the color of orange juice. i watched long enough to make sure there was no movement, neither side to side or up and down. i tried to think of an explanation of what i was seeing. i thought it might be two backlit sails on a boat, but it was above the water horizon line and had no movement at all, no bobbing. there is an old light house that is sometimes in use, but this was not on the right sight line and had no flickering or similarity to the light from the light house. i watched about three minutes or so and then was overcome by fatigue and went to bed. i don't know what i saw, but i cannot identify it. my bedroom looks out over monterey bay over point pinos toward santa cruz. i see this view every night and have never seen anything like last night's sight.
content.summary: Triangles over monterey bay

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving north on interstate 255, a little south of 270, when i saw a strange looking orange light in the sky off to the north east.  i did a "double take" because it looked kind of weird, and then decided to pull off onto the side of the highway so i could get a better look.  
   got out of the car and watched as what looked like an orange glowing sphere moved slowly (much too slow for a meteor) across the night sky from the north east to the south west.  after looking for a minute, i went and got a monocular out of my glove compartment, in order to be able to look more closely.  the monocular helped some, but only to increase the magnification - it still looked like an orange, glowing sphere at about an altitude of roughly 1 to 2,000 feet, moving at about the speed of an airplane in the sky, but with no flashing red, white, or green lights ... just a glowing & slightly pulsating orange spherical appearance ...
   after watching for about 3 to 4 minutes the object became hard to see as it moved off in the distance to the south west ... in the direction of columbia, il.
content.summary: Saw an orange orb moving ne to sw across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Today at lunch [12:50 pm}  august 6 2010 
i was going to go to my car and get some papers, when i got up front doug was standing at the front door and told me there was something in the sky but he did not know what it was 
i went out with him to see what it was.
  i told him  it's a ufo we watch it about 15 minute, until it went out of our sight.
this is what happen when i went outside with doug the ufo was moving slow  less then 5 miles a hour .
it would move forward then it would stop and hover  3 or 4 times the object was dish shape and black.
 then the craft started to rise higher then it would stopped, then start rise higher and higher until it went out of our sight.
the sky was cloudy it was getting ready to rain but it was not raining, when the dish shape object appeared  the object was under the clouds there was no sound coming from the craft.
content.summary: A dish shape craft appeared during the day inside the city limits of loudon.

content.detailedDescription: I was only 8 years old and it was about mid day i have never told anyone so i hope no one knows besides you because i dont want people to think im nuts but 12 years later i still remember it plain as day. my dad one of his friends i cant remember who was with and i were driving somewhere its so long ago... sorry i remember see it was like different colored lights and they kept going it was mid day and it was so weird to see lights on at that time but it so just above the corn... i remember exactly how the went blue to green to red to yellow to orange i never said anything because i was to scared of what  my family would think. i was scared but fascinated at the same time i was just wondering what i saw.
content.summary: Sphere kind of not sure.

content.detailedDescription: This is my 3rd ufo sighting, once in 1975 with 6 other people (including my mother and sister), another 4 years ago with 5 friends, both times were observed for at least 25 minutes (40 minutes on the second sighting).  this sighting, i knew it was coming, had been on my mind all day... i absolutely love the show ufo hunters, i think most of us who have witnessed a ufo want a voice... i'm not crazy.  anyway, back to the story, i was watching cmt and out the reflection of the ontario college of nurse building (oh, i have a picture too!!!), yes i do!  sorry, i'm so excited, holy ****.  uhm, i saw this massive triangular reflection, moving very very slow, too slow for an airplane, then i stood up, as i was already at my window and i saw the entire ufo pass right over my building, very slowly i got a great look at it and then realized, take a picture, and i got one only on my blackberry, but there's no way in hell i'm the only person who saw this.  i called 911 (twice, i was so friggen excited, they got pissed off).  anyway, i've always known they exist and now i'm really seeing the interaction and appearances represent those of us who already know the trust.  please, how vain to think we are the only ones here.  so, i watched it move and almost hover about 200 feet above the ground, closest i've ever been, ever to a ufo. oh my god. it's so exciting, really, trippy too, i was blinking, really trying to observe, just taking in this huge ass triangle floating effortlessly (no sound< none< not a sound, no propulsion engine at all, something that big and no sound.... wow, out of this world and they're here alright.  lol, sorry, rambling, uhm, the thing that was amazing about this one were the lights, and all 3 i have seen, all different, this one without a doubt the closest i've been to one yet ... although two psychics have both seen the first encounter with 45 minutes lost time as a possible abduction, i say cool to that if it happened, i have no recollection, but certainly lost time occured.  this one, was only 1 minute and i managed to get a picture on my blackberry, and when zoomed, yes i got a picture this time< for real.  uhm, back to the lights, they went straight across the one side, then a brilliant pattern, which played tricks on my mind it was like a circular ship then with triangles lighting up, then it looked triangular again, very shape shifting trippy eye work, but i know what i saw, it was that clear, and freakin low, low.  wow, who else saw this?  i haven't loaded the picture from my blackberry yet, but i will, you have my numbers if ya'll want to see it.  thanks, [witness name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: 40-60 feet wide, huge metallic but brilliant illuminating orange/yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I attended the 4th of july firework show at ann morrison park in boise.  just before the firework show started (approximately 10pm), i noticed two orange, star-like objects in the southern sky.  their intensity slowly varied between dim to moderately bright throughout their flight path.  in their "bright" stages, they were clearly brighter than any of the few visible stars in the sky.  both ojects were travelling slowly across the sky from west to east.  their trajectory appeared fairly linear.  after about a minute, one of the objects changed trajectory and drifted away (southward) from the other.  after a few minutes, both ojects began to fade.  a minute after that, they were no longer visible.  nobody else in the large crowd seemed to notice.

i can't discount weather balloons do to their appearance of drifting, their altitude, and their flight direction.  however, they appeared to move faster than what an object blown in the wind would do, and something seemed unnatural about their movement.  it wasn't a blatent ufo sighting, but unusual enough to report.
content.summary: 2 orange spheres moving slowly at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: Early this morning, august 5th, around 4:30 am the power went out in my friend's home (i was staying the night there). just not in his house, but the whole block the street lamps and all were out. my friends and i worked up enough nerve to venture outside. it was pitch black, you literally couldn't see a foot in front of you. armed with some candles and a flashlight we witnessed very strange lighting, purplish lighting with no thunder or rain to go with it. we also noticed a lot of air traffic roughly 7 planes flew over head during this time, we never have that much air traffic period in eastern kentucky, the planes flew in patterns making a rough perimeter around the substation. shortly after the last of the planes we noticed one star shining brighter than the others. lighting flashed, the star became a reddish color, another flash and it was gone. less than five minutes after this we seen a bright egg shaped object zipping across the sky, no flashing lights like a plane and no sound. the object was in view for about a minute before vanishing. less than 5 minutes after this a helicopter flew overhead in the direction of the craft. we were reeling, after waiting about 20 minutes another egg shaped craft came into view, this one much closer, running a zig-zag pattern before going behind some tress and fading out. these craft moved exceptionally fast, and performed moves planes can not. after the event everything returned to normal, no more objects or planes. it was 6 am by the time we were inside. looking back we found the memories were really fuzzy and it had felt as if we had lost time/that time had went too fast.
content.summary: 3 ufos in less than 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i noticed this orb was on august 2nd. it looks like a star, but if you know your neighborhood sky like i do, i knew it was something else. this morning on the way to work, i came down my steps and saw it again. it was in front of my house at a distance. it stayed for about 30 minutes. planes approaching hartfield airport had to see this. its no way a captain of a jetliner did not see this. i grabbed my camera and took shots and video. just like it did earlier in the week, the light faded away and was gone. 

can someone take a look at these shots and tell me what the hell is this?  please email me your comments. if someone has video enhancing software, i believe you will be amazed at what you see.
content.summary: Orb in sky...2nd sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
While videotaping small rc plane, the camera captured the attached objects on about one and one half frames. objects cannot be seen with human eye. attached are two examples of many unusual objects captured on several videos. unfortunately, most of the videos were taken in standard definition at 30 fps and 640x480 pixels.

the larger object is in hd.

one more note: while flying airplane at low speed approximately 60 feet high, i noticed something about the size and shape of a hummingbird, color light gray, was hovering around the plane. considering the timid nature of hummingbirds, it is doubtful that it could have been one.

if this is of interest to you, arrangements can be made to provide you with the full videos so that you can analyze them.

with regards,
[witness name deleted/cms/tg]
content.summary: Possibly a rod

content.detailedDescription:
Observed object while seated in the backyard of a residence, on an outdoor patio with a small group (8 people) of family and friends

object appeared directly overhead as the only bright object in the night sky, many times larger than any known star or satellite (perhaps 3-4 times larger than the planet venus on a clear night, and one quarter the size of a full moon)

given the day and time of sighting (early evening of july 1, canada day, 2010), first thought it might be a firework/rocket released in the neighborhood

initially surprised, then puzzled as to the absence of any sound or trail behind the object, then curious about the possible size and altitude of the object, then anxious to snap a photograph using a cell phone camera, then frustrated at not being able to open the camera before the object disappeared beyond the horizon

discussed the incident with other observers on the patio as the object passed overhead, and then afterwards wondering if we might hear something about it on the news 

the next day, hearing nothing from the news, tried unsuccessfully to research the flight path of the international space station, but learned from on-line research that the relative size of the iss in orbit was much smaller that the size of the object in question  


orange/red regular circular-shaped object glowing steadily, no blinking or flashing lights, moving slowly in a straight line across the sky from north to south, no tail or trail of any kind

size of object comparable to the size of one's pinky fingernail held at arms length away from the eye

object was in constant view for approx. 60-90 seconds, from the time of first sighting when it appeared almost directly overhead until the time it disappeared over the southern horizon
  
moving slowly and steadily across the night sky, similar to an aircraft transiting at high altitude

difficult to determine altitude and speed of the object without knowing size ... if it had been the size of a commercial airliner (airbus, or similar), it is estimated that it might  have been around 10,000-15,000 feet high ... if it was the size of a small, private aircraft or helicopter (cessna 150, or similar), it is estimated that it might have been around 1,000-2,000 feet high 

observer is a retired air force pilot with extensive training and experience in most aspects of military/civilian aerospace operations 

this is the observer's first sighting of an unidentified flying object event
content.summary: As one of 7 witnesses, observed a brightly glowing red/orange circular object, moving slowly/silently across the night sky, disappearing beyond the horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
I deliver the arizona republic in the early morning hours. on sunday morning, july 25th, at 4:35 am i was looking westward out my window in my car. i was stopped and taking a moment to pause and had my window down and was suddenly distracted and awed by the sighting. i looked to my left and followed it across the horizon moving my head to the right.

it was a very clear night and the moon was at quarter, very bright. i saw the most incredible thing. a rather large circular glowing object with a tail like a comet moving extremely rapidly northwestward. it crossed the entire horizon in about 1 second and was out of sight. i had a very good look at it. it���s color was the most pure green, including its tail. the color resembled that of a green stop light, maybe a little lighter, but the color was completely pure. the tail was quite long and the color was diminishing the further out it was. if i would have placed my finger tip over the moving object, it was about the size of my little finger nail (i have big hands) and the length of the tail was probably as wide as i could spread my fingers on my hand in front of my face. the moving object was circular with pure green light emanating from it with a glowing halo.

i was in a residential neighborhood and there was no activity around me or other moving lights, only a few porch lights. i am also a pilot, or used to be many years ago ��� commercially licensed with ifr rating. i know what i saw. i don���t see how that could have been a meteor or comet. it had to be an intelligently controlled flight that was thru the atmosphere at a very high rate of speed.

i have no evidence but just wanted to ask you if you could tell me if anyone else had reported this sighting to you ?
content.summary: Circular with pure green light - large from my distance with long tail thru atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying into seatle and took a picture from the plane. i looked at the pictures later and found this ufo in one. not much else to say. just wanted to know if someone could clean it up and make it clearer. (i just picked a county so i could submit this. i was flying, how would i know...)
content.summary: I didn't see it until i checked the pictures.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:20 p.M. on july 28, 2010 i was sitting on my roof garden looking east toward the moon. the roof garden is on top of a 2-story building. the position of the light from my vantage point was directly east of ocean drive and 12th street in south beach, florida. to the left of the almost-full moon was a stationary blue light that was blinking. then next time i saw it blinking it had dropped and proceeded to drop then go to the right under the moon. when it was to the right of the moon, it started dropping again until it was under the tree line. i never saw it move; i only saw it blink then each subsequent time it was blinking, it was in a different position.  the whole event lasted 10 minutes.  did anyone else see it?
content.summary: Like a blue-colored blinking star but moved until disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a police officer in bucks county pennsylvania and while on patrol at 0500hrs i noted an extremely bright light in the sky.  i exited my patrol vehicle and watched the light (not moving) for approximately 30 seconds.  the light then dimmed and began to travel south at a high rate of speed and disappeared (or my eyes couldnt focus on the dim light anymore).  when it dimmed it appeared like a tiny star in the sky.  when i exited my vehicle the light was brighter than any of the stars/planets in the sky and appeared like a helicopter spot light.  the event lasted 30-45 seconds under mostly clear skies.

possible satellite?  i was under the assumption they only move east to west. i do see a lot of "shooting stars" since i work only nights, but have never seen anything of this nature.  i have also caught brief glimpses of satellites but never anything this bright and not moving for a period of time.

i must remain anonymous due to my job.
content.summary: Extremely bright light not moving in sky - dimmed and flew away.

content.detailedDescription: We were in the house still buzzing about a strange object we saw about an hour earlier when i looked out the front window (facing east) and saw a strange car sitting at the end of the street with only its parking lights on. i called my mom over to take a look and a few seconds later she suddenly said "look, a white light!��� i immediately looked in the direction she was looking to see a white spherical star-like white flashing light darting around in an amazing and shocking way. we looked at each other and said "airplanes don't do that!���  we were startled as we continued to watch the object and right before our eyes a second object of the same sort appeared right behind the first.  it almost looked as though they were playing chase in the sky in an erratic way.  at that point i said "i'm gonna get the camera" as my mom continued to watch.  just as i rushed away to get the camera, i heard my mom say "oh my god, one of them just shot off so fast, it almost left a trail of light!" and just as quickly, it returned again.  very strange. but if that wasn't strange enough, things got weirder.  i couldn't get pictures because the backlight on the camera was too bright in the pitch dark and prevented me from seeing the objects.  we continued to watch until a plane came through almost in the direction of the objects.  as soon as the plane got close, the objects disappeared.  once the plane passed through the area, they showed up again.  this happened twice.  and again after the second plane passed, they returned again soon after.  almost like they were hiding.  that left us feeling very uneasy.  we didn't know what to think.  as air traffic picked up, they disappeared one last time never to be seen again.   this happened at about 10:45 pm in northern illinois. august 4th, 2010
content.summary: Bright white spherical objects darting around in a shocking way.

content.detailedDescription:
At a little after 3am, as my brother, a friend and i were leaving my brother���s place in the south end of town and making our way to his van, something in the far eastern sky caught my brother���s eye. after pointing it out to us, we fixed our eyes on it as well and immediately tried to figure out what the thing was. the object had an orange color to it, no visible blinking lights, and flickered like a flame. by using a telephone pole as a marker, we could track its movement pattern, which changed directions from left to right, almost as if it were being effected by wind, except that it was moving in straight lines. at first we thought it was something attached to a balloon, until we noticed that it became perfectly stationary more than once. any movement it made was very gradual and calculated, but it was definitely traveling. we noticed it was neither getting further away or closer to us and only traveled a very small distance up and to the right from where we originally marked it with the telephone pole.

we were watching this thing for a good 5 or 10 minutes, still clueless as to what it could be, when all of the sudden the object disappeared in a lightning-like white flash, followed by a loud boom that echoed off the mountains behind us in the far distance. the only explanations we could come up with were a) it was a craft of some kind that took off at such a high rate of speed that it created that loud boom, or b) it was an explosion of some sort. what we can���t figure out about the explosion theory, however, is the white flash. a firework, perhaps? the only problem with that, though, is that fireworks always have a visible flame or spark. this thing was just a pure white flash of light with no visible flames, sparks or smoke. it was just gone.

anyone else who may have seen this that night is welcome to e-mail me @ 
*(wit's email address deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Orange object in eastern sky, disappears in white flash of light and loud boom.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished putting my dogs in thier pen for the night and looked up into the sky above the treeline and saw an object made of several lights sortof hovering. i noticed the object because it seemed out of place in the night sky. this startled me so i walked back toward my house and the object slowly moved down behind the treeline. when it moved it did not move in straight lines or abrupt zigzags but more fluid, more like swimming than flying. when i first saw the object i thought it could be a plane or a chopper but i heard no noise and immediatly thought it was a ufo. after the object passed all the hair on my body stood on end. i came inside, told my wife what happened and got a flashlight. i went back outside followed our driveway all the way down to the gravel road (around 400ft). on the way i felt watched and started hearing owls and coyotes up in the hills around our land. i went back inside and got my revolver, loaded it and went back outside to take yet another look. i did not see the object again or hear the coyotes or owls. we live at the head of a hollow near yatesville lake.
content.summary: Ufo over treetop lawrence county kentucky.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside having my morning coffee as usual. as it was getting light the only things you could see in the sky were the few remaining brightest stars and a quarter moon to the east and jupiter to the southwest. by this time it is 5:30 in the morning. as i was sitting facing west i saw a bright light coming toward me over the roof tops and through the trees that i see to my west. to my direct west, on the northern side of the port of stockton, is i5 and the main channel to the port of stockton. i stood up to get a better view before it cleared the trees. it was a steady single bright light and there was no sound. it was approximately 1000 to 1500 ft straight up. i truly expected it to be a plane but, with no sound i don't believe it was a plane. it also did not appear to have wings and it definitely did not have wing lights. no red or green only the single bright light. when i viewed it through the binoculars the light appeared to be on the bottom glowing forward. the light was so bright i could not make out the shape and when i started viewing with the binoculars it increased in speed and altitude. i see a lot of things at night but i never expected to see anything this early in the morning.
content.summary: Single bright light about 1000 to 1500ft  from the ground and no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I had a very bizarre childhood experience when i was 11, and
it was also witnessed by two other people: my dad, and my little sister. to put it plainly, we saw four semi-transparent beings with human-like
appendages and heads flying in the sky maybe 10-12 feet above us one night
in our frony yard in yucca valley california. we were walking to our car to go somewhere when they appeared. they seemed not to notice us
and actually were playfully chasing each other around in the sky. it was
almost as if they were made out of pure light. they were maybe 3-4 feet
tall, had very little detail, and were randomly flying in no particular
patterns. we watched them for maybe two minutes. they never got really close to us or tried to approach us. i know what you're thinking: theatre
spotlights or some kids playing with flashlights. but there were no light
sources coming from below or above them...There were no beams of light
coming from the ground to where they were floating. they were suspended in
mid-air, and like i said were literally no more than 10 feet above our
heads. my dad and my sister still remember to this day that night, and most people can't offer an explanation for it when i tell them the story. i've researched many things since then to try to connect it with anything real. ghosts, aliens, angels...I don't know what they were, but they did not look or act anything like these things. after a couple minutes they just vanished...Literally winked out of existence. they seemed very benevolent yet very foreign, but the three of us felt like we weren't in danger. i just wanted to report it to you guys and wanted some answers that might explain that night. thank you.
content.summary: 4 human-shaped light beings above our heads.

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out of window above the stairs in my house and seen a bright orange light like a fire ball dancing/flashing for around 25-50  seconds then disappeared followed by one or two small flashes was very bright tho really stood out in the sky very thick cloud to night too 


never seen anything like it before 

anyone know what it was?
content.summary: Bright orange fireball glow in clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Saw 3 star shaped objects traveling across the sky around 10 pm outside of edgerton, kansas. at first i thought these objects were satellites. however they were following each other and making 90 degree turns. they came from the north east and went to the south then to south west. they seemed to have been making a square pattern. not sure what to make of it. i'm going back out tonight to see if they are there again. if anyone else is seeing the same stuff please post it. thanks.
content.summary: 3 lights ne to s to sw.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On this night like every night i watch the sky for satellites or things.  

looking straight upwards at time 22:40 i saw at hi-alt 3 satellite type objects moving north-n-e. two of them where on a slight convergence route the other crossed their path going north. the two convergence objects; one of which was of a slightly faster than normal satalight speed, while the other was moving very fast and clean (3 or 4 times faster than a normal sat type object, no trails i was quit impressed with this fast object!. 10 mins later i caught a glimpse of a wing like object, this object was not as hi as the others.It was flying from same area of sky but towards the west,also much faster than an aircraft an equivalent size. it moved in a straight line for about 5 sec's then did a sweeping u-turn without dropping height. it went of in the direction of the 2 satellite-like objects. so 3 sat's and a wing like craft, no sounds or trails. the wing like craft had a slight orange glow as if lit up by the city's street lights, it was faint. i managed to view this wing with a low powered monocular. it was not a bird or a plane, the movement was not familiar.

these objects had enough effect on me to prompt me to make this report.
content.summary: Stright upwards at hi-alt i first saw 3 satelite type objects, then a wing like craft.

content.detailedDescription: Jet was sparying chemtrails which they do several times per week and i always watch them when i am oitside and wounder what they are spraying and why.  this jet was leaving a good trail from one side of the sky to the other and i could see the jet clearly and then the jet just vanished. the sky was clear and the jet was very visible then it vanished leaving the trail behind. i know this is not a ufo but thought u might be interested.  it happened from  my back yard while i was watching my kids swim.  i lost sight of it when it disappeared  into thin air.
content.summary: Jet.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst returning back to the campervan we saw a strange orange light in the sky, we thought that it could have been a plane, we then realised it wasn't, and then suddenly without any signs of a sudden manouver it flew up into the air and dissapeared into the clouds. in some amount of shock we made are way into the campervan and sat down, and then we noticed that another strange, brighter light had began to move in the same path as the other, almost as if it was following it and then as the previous object it flew up into the sky and dissapeared behind the clouds. after looking at the photographs that we had taken of the objects we noticed that there was a third strange red disc shaped object above the others. as the second orange object passed my wife's mobile phone lit up as if she was recieving a message or phone call, but nothing was on the screen. we then looked at the clock and noticed that it had lost 5 hours.
content.summary: One orange light appeared and suddenly rose up into the sky, and the other followed its pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
It was on october 31, 1999 at 9:00 pm when i sense that there is something coming from the skies and it was a strange feeling.. so from my curiosity i went outside our house and to my surprise i saw 11 oval orb-like light formations blinking in red and orange colors circling each other as it passes just a kilometer or in a very low altitude just like a plane landing in a runaway as it cruised just above the roof of our home.I immediately called my parents and my younger brother and together we witnessed the said sighting. and honestly we saw it coming towards our street.The ufo's just went on their distance until they disappeared to our sight. since then i automatically believes in ufo's and extra terrestrial phenomenons. it happened so long ago but it still lurks in our memories-those light formations.During that time we don't possess video or a camera so attached with this report is my hand sketched drawing of what i saw. when the movie "sightings" starred by mel gibson and joaquin phoenix.. the part of the scene when joaquin phonenix saw the same light formations we witnessed in the news he was watching. when you tube came along i searched other experiences and my whole curiosity about the history and origin about ufo's took place.

note:

i am now a fresh landed immigrant here in winnipeg manitoba.
content.summary: Sighting of an 11 light formations.

content.detailedDescription: This is a repost of my earlier report except this one includes the pictures i wasnt able to attach to the original. the first two pictures are original size and may be hard to see. the third is an edited version of one of the pictures and has been enlarged. if you have any questions  or would like me to send you the pictures personally, you can reach me at 8(wit's email address deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: 4 cigar ufos within half an hour right above my house!!!

content.detailedDescription:
Last night at 9:47 p.M. in decatur county , indiana (08/04/10 ) i was watching the cloud to cloud lighting that was caused by the solar flares when i spotted a light coming in that looked eerie ,

 i immediately yelled for my wife, she ran out to join my on our upstairs balcony. 

it was steadily coming straight towards us, without a sound not following nor preceding....Silent! but what i found the craziest was the feeling in my gut and back and legs, i felt vibrations internally i cannot begin to describe the feeling! anyway this thing is maybe 100-150 yards above the corn field and steadily heading directly over our heads we both look up in amazement and hold each others hands...The whole time my 3 yr old daughter standing in the doorway watching...

as these lights moved closer, we both knew it wasn't a vehicle of any sort that we have seen before. brightest lights at it's point of direction , with a tiny blue light one either sides of the lead point and the eerie glow of the two corners that had lights but weren't as piercing as its head point. 
it was obviously triangle the background being illuminated by cloud 2 cloud lightning, this was a steadily approaching triangular craft that had 4-5 lights in the center that were illuminated in different grades of firey red, it did'nt spin at all like always imagined...So after it flew directly above our heads we ran out the other side of our place to watch it leave, it left as it came silent, and steady...
content.summary: Triangle, silent, not spinning or fluttering as it comes near. 4-5 red lights at different intensity of red.

content.detailedDescription: Around 8pm on july 6th i noticed three white lights flying very low coming from the south in the direction of gervias oregon.  i was very excited to see something so out of the ordinary, i immediately ran in my house to grab my wife, so she could witness the event, as we exited the house we immediately looked up and to our amazement the object flew directly over us. at this time we became concerned because of the altitude that the object was at but more important we were surprised to hear no sounds coming from the object. i am not sure on the dimensions of the object but i can say that it took about 15 to 20 seconds for the entire object to fly over us. the object had three white lights, one light on each end. we have notice a large amount of sky activity in our area. since this event we have seen several objects that we consider unusual. in the area we live in we have a clear line of site, low city lights and open acres, ideal for sky watching. we have not spoken of this until today, but we believe it is of great significance.
content.summary: Large triangle shape with three white lights.

content.detailedDescription: It all started in the spring of 2006 when i found a new place to go 4 wheeling with my truck. i would go down by a little pond and just sit there with my wife at the time she showed me this place. and she called it creepy woods she had been going there for years she said she felt offten times something was'nt right about the place. and she was right! i could always sence the preasance. of something not animal and i knew it was'nt human and i was at peace with it.I just knew there was something.Beoned anything i had ever seen. we would go down there almost every nite with the dogs to let them swim in the pond and there were many times the dogs would be skidish.And the sence of being watched was very strong. very few times did it seem right.The road geting to the pond is not maintained in the winter.We would stay out there until way after dark some times until 1-2 am she would not spend much time looking up into the sky but i did and when i saw lights moveing across the sky and flying low and no noise. i would tell her look and she would say what is it.I'd reply more importently why is that heilocopter following it. then she would say i want to go home and we would. this has ben going on for me for 2 and a half years.Then on halloween eve. 2008 we decided to go drive around the woods. when we got to the power lines i looked to my left and said look at that about 1.5 miles out just above the power lines there was a bright light it looked almost like a star and i said noway it was following the power lines about 10ft. above the tree lineand moveing very slowly and when i looked past the light i could see 2 fighter jets in attack formation,they could have been f-16s from a base in the stae of vt. or a-10s from ma. when i first saw the light i stoped my truck and backed up to the edge of the power lines.And shut the truck off then we could ear a helicopter that cut in front of the light and went behind us it stayed at about our 7:00 o'colck and stayed there as the light got clsoer i could look into it and saw that it was 3 lights i could it was long and i could see 2 seperateers makeing it 3just behind and to the right and left there were 2 green lights. and i could make out the steel like cage around then they were about mid ship. and to the outer ends at the aft there were 2 red lights. with the same cage around them. it was a huge black triangle and all 3 corners were rounded it had to be atleast 60-80ft. each side i know this because i got out of my truck and got up into the backwhen it was at my 10 oclock it slowed down even more so i could get a good look. it was a calm evening no breeze and the tops of the trees didnt even move. my wife wouldnt get out of the truck she said she couldnt move she was that scared,while this was going on i could here the heilocopter comeing around and when the ship was at my 1-o'clock it made a flat left turn. and at the same time the heilocopterwas at my 1-o'clock it was all black with no markings. it was so close i could make out the one pilot and when he saw me and he did he made an agresive hard left turn toward the craft it inturn jumped up like it was sitting on one corner and i could see that the top of the craft was flat and very smoth the whole craft was like black gunblueing not shiny not dull then the craft came down flat i could see the craft and heilocopter at the same time i didnt blink my eyes and the craft was gone and the heilo in slow persute.Then we went down to where the road to creepy woods starts to the turn around i backed in and got out to relieve my self and befor i could get back into the truck we saw the heilocopter fly over our heads. we looked at each other and said at the same time this has happend befor many times in the last 2.5 years whether out at the pond or at the turnaround that heilocopter is always around and now we knew why.It was almost dark when we got to the turnaround, and as i was geting into my truck i said look at that straight ahead into the woods we could see the green and red lights but no head lights and it was very low. and as i was geting ready to start the truck. ilooked up and out of my windshield and about 40-50ft. into the woods about 15-20ft. off the ground was a 4-5ft.Diamiter orb and it was an amber color with the strangest lights inside it like lightening? from the time we left the power lines until we saw the orb. was about 2miles deeper into the woods. i knew and i was right it was just a matter of time and it is still going on out there, you can not just look at the sky you have to look at the ground and you can see the signs there everywhere. thank you for you'r time in this matter. we do know what we saw and i know they are still there and will be for some time to come.Ps. after we saw the orb. we decided it was time to go home and we did
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was driving through the woods as i always did and while going under some power lines i could see a low flying light it headed my way it was awsome.
